amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Bureau of Land Management by $10 million and increase funding for EPA's Great Lakes Restoration Initiative by a similar amount for the purpose of stopping Asian carp from migrating into the Great Lakes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase EPA/EPM by $10,000,000, offset by BLM/MLR (Asian carp).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clarke (MI) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 251 (Roll no. 651).
